nodes.text: Kaz's talisman was a wooden doll acquired by the archaeologist Mika Grey on her journeys throughout the galaxy. It was a small, brown, humanoid-shaped figurine. She gave it to Kazuda Xiono as a good luck charm after the pilot had apparently been cursed by the pirate Leoz, primarily as a way to help him deal with the psychological effects of him believing that he was affected by a curse. The talisman had the desired effect, with Xiono able to overcome his fear of the alleged curse, even though he had dropped the charm on a hangar floor. Afterwards, Xiono tossed the talisman in Leoz's stew and told the Nikto it was cursed, causing him to fling it away in a panic. Xiono shortly returned the object to Grey.

Kaz's talisman first appeared in the Star Wars Resistance episode "Kaz's Curse". At one point during the episode's development, the talisman was said to have been discovered by Grey on Mimban, while another iteration of the story had it be a toy doll that Eila was missing.
